Martins Okechukwu Justice (amụrụ na Septemba 29, 1977), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ J
Martins, bụ onye egwu Naijiria, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe.A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya "Oyoyo" "Jupa" na "Good Or Bad" J
A makwaara na Martins gosipụtara na egwu P-Square, "E No Easy". O gosikwara Phyno, YCEE, Fally Ipupa, DJ Arafat, Koffi Olomide, Timaya.
Martins na Onitsha, Anambra State, Nigeria, ma nwee agbụrụ ezinụlọ na Ohafia, Abia Siteet.
